CustomField.formula: if(LEN(FS_Store_Number__c)>0, FS_Store_Number__c& ", " , "" ) & BR() & if(LEN(ShippingStreet)>0, ShippingStreet& ", " , "" )& if(LEN(ShippingCity)>0, ShippingCity& ", " , "" )& if(LEN(ShippingState)>0, ShippingState& " " , "" )& if(LEN(ShippingPostalCode)>0, ShippingPostalCode,"") & BR() & If(LEN(ShippingCountry) >0, ShippingCountry,"") & BR() & If(LEN(Phone) >0, Phone,"")
CustomField.label: Concatenated Address
